summary: When strange seeds drift to earth from space, mysterious pods begin to grow and invade San Francisco, California, where they replicate the residents into emotionless automatons one body at a time.
cast: Donald Sutherland|Brooke Adams|Jeff Goldblum|Veronica Cartwright|Leonard Nimoy|Art Hindle|Lelia Goldoni|Kevin McCarthy|Don Siegel|Tom Luddy|Stan Ritchie|David Fisher|Tom Dahlgren|Garry Goodrow|Jerry Walter|Maurice Argent|Sam Conti|Wood Moy|R.
